Title: Phobia
Writer: Gary Sherman (story), Ronald Shusett (story), Lew Lehman (screenplay), Jimmy Sangster (screenplay), Peter Bellwood (screenplay)
Actors: Paul Michael Glaser, Susan Hogan, John Colicos, David Bolt
Plot: A psychiatrist treats his patients - sufferers from agoraphobia, claustrophobia, acrophobia, a fear of snakes, and a fear of man - with radical therapy in which they confront their fears by watching them on a large screen. The result is that each patient is driven to commit violent acts, and each dies by what he most fears.
